website_summaries.verdict: Flip design guarantees perfectly shaped and cooked waffles every time and allows for space-saving vertical storage.
pros: Adjust temperature to control how fluffy/crispy your waffles are
Nonstick coating lasts longer and cooks faster than other nonstick surfaces
cons: Handle isn’t as sturdy as it could be

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - great results. Even non-wheat batter cooks well and slides out easily
customer_reviews.text: My family is switching to wheat alternatives (oat flour, coconut flour, etc) and they tended to stick on our old teflon-coated waffle iron. We also recognize that the teflon may be harmful, especially once it gets scratched or starts to flake off. This ceramic coating is amazing, and our stickiest batters are popping right out without issues. We are having to leave the waffles in a little longer to get them 'done' to our liking, but once we got the timing figured out, we've really enjoyed cooking and eating waffles.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dowlen

customer_reviews.title: Raw Waffles
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker by oester only cooks one side of the waffle. I literally had to flip the waffle over after the light came on indicating that the waffle was done. It was not done. Then I had to cook it for several more minutes. The result was not good. I made multiple attempts, one time neither side of the waffle cooked. I am returning it. This is my second attempt at purchasing a waffle maker from amazon. This item really should not be on Amazon since this one side does not cook issue seems to be common complaint.
customer_reviews.author: K. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Waffle Maker
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to like this waffle maker given it's non-toxic, non-stick surface. However, after a few times, I have found that it is extremely hard to clean - the plates do not deattach - and it makes unevenly cooked waffles. Now, the batter seems to be sticking so that when I open the maker, the inside of the waffle is raw and the outside that is stuck to the grids, is crispy. It is hard to gauge the temp and does not alert you as to when the waffle is ready. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not good. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this waffle maker because it free of lots of chemicals that would normally be used in non-stick waffle makers. This item is overratted. When I put in my cold batter on the hot waffle plates temp at max), I hear no sizzling sound. I have tried many waffle batters and everytime waffles end up either mushy or soggy after good 20 minutes of cooking. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: Changing my review on this product. I HATE it. It does not fully cook my waffles at all. If I turn up the power to cook it more it burns the top of the waffle. Extremely bulky product, excellent non stick area but a huge pain to clean. Would like to see removal plates. I am throwing this one out.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Loose handle
customer_reviews.text: The machine is very good to use aside of two things: 1. When rotating the pan - many times the 2 handles come undone and separate from one another and being that it is hot, there is no way to reconnect them while in the middle of cooking. 2. when rotating the pan, it does not rotate all the way - it still has aways to rotate but instead it rotates backwards. I wish that it was a heavier/sturdier product.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: like tater tots
customer_reviews.text: it seems to me the iron doesn't get hot enough to crisp the waffles. i end up with soggy, limp, flaccid pancakes. it handles other foods well, like tater tots. however, i am reviewing this as a waffle iron, not a tater tot iron.
customer_reviews.author: S Yan Wing Chan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean ceramic waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item for a family that makes lots of waffles!! First, the non stick surface is great, easy to keep clean and smooth. Clean up is usually a hassle when making waffles, the surface makes cleaning it easy. I usually still wipe a little oil on it when I am finished. Second, it cooks quickly and waffles are even and look good. The only thing that I found odd about it was there were no instructions. So it took me a few tries before I figured out that you had to turn and bend the handle for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Annderson

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: When we first got this, we were going to return it because it felt flimsy and cheap compared to our old broken one. We decided to give it a try though and glad we did. We make waffles 1-2/week and feel good that we’re not get positioned by a tephlan coating. It’s true it just wipes clean each time.
customer_reviews.author: JessieSho

customer_reviews.title: Used it for the first time this morning and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time this morning and I am HOOKED! The waffles cooked fast and even. The ceramic surface was perfectly non stick! Have to update and lower star rating. Everything went great for waffles.... When I decided to try the tater tot hash browns {and I *DID* defrost them first} the handle snapped right off. It's plastic when the rest of the device is metal - that's going to cause a really severe stress point. I tried using it a few times without the handle, but it would not flip without it and ended up throwing it away. Will probably have to go with the stationary one as I adored the nonstick ceramic surface!
customer_reviews.author: Lhiannon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS UNIT After 6 months of use the non stick stopped working
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS UNIT. After 6 months of use the non stick stopped working! For no reason the non stick surface started sticking and ruined many, many waffles. I then had to buy a waffle iron non stick spray. I am really upset. October 2019 UPDATE . Now the unit stopped heating up. DO NOT BUY THIS UNIT!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Yummy waffles if you’re willing to go through the extra cleaning trouble
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Made amazing waffles. It is frustrating to clean though. Can’t remove the waffle plates.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly lasted 11 months
customer_reviews.text: It broke after 11 months and we were never crazy about it. Never cooked the waffles evenly and the waffles always came out a bit on the undone side! Very hard to clean because of the design. There are much much better waffle makers in the market. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: P. Maghsoudnia

customer_reviews.title: Great Waffle Maker
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker is really a good one. Totally non-stick surface and it lets you know when the waffles are done. I was a little concerned that I would not be able to keep up with the demand as my kids devoured them but they are quite large. Each waffle is easily split into fours because there are separation lines cooked into each waffle - a neat feature. Clean up is a simple wipe of the surface. Can't beat this waffle maker for the money. Geo
customer_reviews.author: Feisey

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! It cooks waffles perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 10 stars if I could! This is amazing! It cooks waffles perfectly! It leaves no sticky residue and wipes clean with a wet paper towel! I made protein powder waffles and they are the best I've ever had, way better than pancakes. I plan on trying all kinds of things in this waffle iron for different meals and snacks. I am so pleased and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice waffle maker! We purchased it as a health-friendly replacement for a teflon waffle maker. This one is just as easy to use as the previous waffle maker and over-all appears to be better quality. We were so happy to find an affordable one like this, made with DuraCeramic!
customer_reviews.author: DMA

customer_reviews.title: good product, scuffs on outside of mine though.
customer_reviews.text: so far im happy with this waffle maker.. i was a little disappointed that it had a few scuffs in the outside finish, but was glad the inside ceramic didnt!, i know that stuff CAN chip, but mine was fine! also was a little cautious about the cord not being wrapped up, but still had the twist ties on it, my first thought was it might be a refurbished unit. if it is, it didnt state so prior to buying it, and if it is, it works just fine! 4 stars for scuffs.. products works 5 starts though. looking forward to making pizza pockets, hash browns, french toast, and all the fun stuff u can make in a waffle maker!!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite kitchen appliances
customer_reviews.text: Another Sunday morning staple. I read an article on another site all the different uses for a waffle iron and I just had to buy this. The one I had before was much cheaper square one. This has nice deep pockets for butter and syrup, and the ceramic surface is much easier to clean than my older square model. I liked toe idea of flipping the waffles for more even cooking but after months of use I'm not convinced that it makes much if any difference to the final outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Askjok

customer_reviews.title: Highly disposable! waste of money
customer_reviews.text: So far....it is waisting a lot of energy, simple it does't work at all. Despite the fact I've tried to warm it up for 3, 5 even 10 minutes before pouring the mix....it does't heat the waffle. Don't waste your money, I recommed looking for something more powerful in terms of heating power.
customer_reviews.author: Forfest

customer_reviews.title: Great Waffle Maker for Price!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing on this earth is expected to be as one expects it to be granted. Therefore, granted, this is an excellent product for it's price! The waffles take a little longer to get browner than when the ready light comes on, however one must consider what is ready for each of us, when we perceive what we see, as based on what we think. If one wants it to be browner when ready light comes on, than wattage should be their concern. Nothing is built to last when it comes to elements, you can ask your light bulbs on wattages, elements, and burnouts!😉😎😲😜
customer_reviews.author: Absolute

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it because there just aren’t that many options for an affordable non-toxic waffle maker. But it’s pretty bad quality. The handle is especially flimsy. The ceramic coating was scratched when I got it. I sent it right back.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I was hesitant to buy a waffle maker since I am not sure about all these non stick coatings. However, after doing some research on this duraceramic material I felt ok about this particular waffle maker so I purchased it. So far I have made buckwheat waffles and they are really good. They cook fast, they cook well, and they do not stick at all. I guess only time will tell as far as the coating's durability goes.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Martinez Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: coating and finish flaking after 1 use!
customer_reviews.text: disappointed both inside (that durable ceramic coating???) and outside finish flaking after 1 use! had similar Oster in past and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: carrots

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: The first one of these I received had several chips in the approximately 1 micron thick layer of "ceramic" and I sent it back. Second one had a dent in the side and didn't close properly. The third one seems to be free of defects, however, this is still an incredibly wobbly, fragile, cheaply made piece of junk. It makes a decent waffle, but man, it's seriously just flimsy plastic. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: LoRoK

customer_reviews.title: Best waffle maker I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking a long time for a waffle maker that didn't use the standard non-stick coating. The one we were replacing had the unfortunate -- but all too common -- problem where the non-stick coating was coming off onto the waffle (I wasn't about to eat that toxic mess). So, when I saw this maker, the ceramic coating intrigued me. What a great waffle maker. Cooks fantastic waffles, even cooking from outer edges to the center. And the waffles haven't threatened to stick once. Couldn't recommend higher.
customer_reviews.author: D. Heintz

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Ceramic waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I like it because it’s ceramic. Tip: put coconut oil with a silicone spatula, and then add the waffle mix. Great to make banana oatmeal waffles
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Worst waffle iron ever!
customer_reviews.text: Was given this as a Christmas present and we are very disappointed this is the worst waffle iron I have ever had. It does not make crispy waffle and I have tried the recipes in the book that came with the iron and my own recipe and a mix and they all come out soggy and half cooked. I use the highest setting and follow the directions and with absolutely terrible results. Would send back but box got thrown out. Maybe I got a lemon! but does not work for us!
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love it!
customer_reviews.text: The slot that holds the waffle maker when it’s flipped upside down is a bit hard to engage.
customer_reviews.author: Tina A. Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The ceramic plates heat very well but are not removable for cleaning. Worst feature is the handle, which broke off yesterday, making the waffle iron very difficult to use now. This has had very light use, since it was so awkward to clean, so it's not as if the handle was worn out.
customer_reviews.author: lazy cook

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker is so easy to use and makes the best, softest waffles. Great buy at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Durable Wafflemaker
customer_reviews.text: Perfect waffle maker. Makes waffles quickly and saves us time at breakfasts. It's been two years since I bought it and it is working great. The titanium infused duraceramic surface makes waffles without oil. I am more than satisfied with this product. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Osman U.

customer_reviews.title: Great waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I have not had any problems whatsoever with sticking. I do not grease the iron at all and have made waffles with both regular flour and gluten free flour, all vegan. Excited to try more recipes
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Leatherman

customer_reviews.title: Great little waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Had wanted one for a while so researched these and this one seemed to be the best fit. Very happy worth this economical purchase. Evenly cooks waffles on its nonstick surface. Could not be happier with the product. Use it weekly and no problems work consistency.
customer_reviews.author: S Good

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this.
customer_reviews.text: I've been making waffles for 15 years from scratch with previous Belgium Waffle maker. This model does not heat up enough to brown or crisp the waffle. I have left the waffle maker on the highest heat level and left it in for extra time. Nothing helps. I wish I had listened to the other reviews. I would not purchase this item again!
customer_reviews.author: Allison B. Silvia

customer_reviews.title: This product allowed me to safely make waffles that tasted amazing with no worry
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a waffle maker that was free of PTFE & PFOA chemicals. I have birds in my home and most cookware fumes can kill them. This product allowed me to safely make waffles that tasted amazing with no worry. It came well packaged, a fast wipe down and it was ready to go. Followed the basic instructions to make big golden waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Kat M

customer_reviews.title: You can get that waffle nice and crispy on high
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and it's truly non-stick. You can get that waffle nice and crispy on high. One star off because everything around the waffle irons is made out of solo cup plastic... just be really careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: A decent product but could be better made
customer_reviews.text: My rating for this would be good to okay. It does a job and I don't feel I wasted my money on it. This would get more stars from me if the indicating light works properly and shuts/locls a little more completely. Not that difficult to clean but I wish it was easier or could be easily disassembled for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Twins Rock

customer_reviews.title: Result Too Soft Not Belgian Style
customer_reviews.text: My previous inexpensive iron delivers a crisp waffle, and because I was buying 3 for gifts I bought this brand - recommended by America’s Kitchen - unfortunately this model does not crisp the waffle but leaves it fairly blond.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make vegan waffels. as te insert says I did not get that snokey. Urnt smell making first waffel taste 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline howell

customer_reviews.title: Unit does not stay level when cooking
customer_reviews.text: Unit will not stay at level when flipped over, keeps tilting to the left side, making the waffle cook unevenly. If you hold the unit even, it cooks fine.
customer_reviews.author: RUNTY 1

customer_reviews.title: We have been making waffles nonstop since we got it a couple of days ago and they are delicious and perfect every time
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! We have been making waffles nonstop since we got it a couple of days ago and they are delicious and perfect every time! As others have mentioned, turn the heat up to high and follow the light indicators on the waffle maker - foolproof. We do no use any oil or butter on the ceramic plates and they are naturally nonstick. Best of all no Teflon to achieve this.
customer_reviews.author: landd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it's ceramic as it is safer. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Waffles Are Soft, Not Crisp
customer_reviews.text: Waffles don't stick one bit, which has been an ongoing problem with other waffle makers I've owned. But one big drawback is that the waffles don't get crispy no matter how long you cook them, even when set on high temperature. They're delicious, but always soft.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Highlander

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: One of my new favorite kitchen appliances. I love how it folds to store and takes up so little space! Easy to clean, releases food 100% of the time. I have used it several times a month for the last 6 months. No damage, easy to clean, works great every time. Love the blue color, too! Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Haddox

customer_reviews.title: Easy weekend breakfast
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean, perfect to make paleo waffles, kids approved
customer_reviews.author: Lore

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value no stick is amazing no spray needed. Easy clean up
customer_reviews.author: jmck61

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: I've done my research and for the price you won't find better.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: I like this waffle maker very much
customer_reviews.text: I like this waffle maker very much. after using it 3 times, I think I finally have figured out how to make my waffles the way I like them. I just followed instructions provided by Oster and was patient in not flipping waffle maker as soon as light turned green. I usually wait 2-3 minutes after light turns green to flip waffle maker. Total cook time is usually 5 to 7 minutes. Once waffle is fully cooked it is very easy to take waffle out.
customer_reviews.author: David warren

customer_reviews.title: Addicting waffles ♥️
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this product and use it daily! Super quick and delicious waffles, watch out though because you may get addicted! Wonderful with blueberries and chocolate mixed in. Best purchase I’ve made on amazon in the past year!
customer_reviews.author: Ambie

customer_reviews.title: The kids made waffles for 5 days straight! The ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids made waffles for 5 days straight! The DuraCeramic plates remained perfectly clean and never did a waffle stick to them!
customer_reviews.author: B.B.

customer_reviews.title: the light indicator doesn't really tell you when the waffle is done but clean up is easy. Even though it's non stick definitely
customer_reviews.text: I've tried three different recipes and two turned out well, the light indicator doesn't really tell you when the waffle is done but clean up is easy. Even though it's non stick definitely recommend spraying it before putting batter in.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little waffle maker, easy clean up, light weight, easy storage and truly nonstick. In two minutes breakfast is on the plate. I can pick it up with one hand, no heavy as lead item. I am considering this item for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: E. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic coating flaking off after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was happy with the product, although the plastic construction feels very flimsy. It cooked waffles fine. Unfortunately, the ceramic coating is flaking off after only 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Chunky Bacon!

customer_reviews.title: No waffling, it's a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Far easier and less messy than pancakes, and waffles come out neatly and cleanly. I doubt it would be good for heavy use, but is great for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Charles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Real fine maker if you like Belgian style thick waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Montana

customer_reviews.title: Over all it was a huge disappointment. I will never order another Oster product
customer_reviews.text: This product was very shoddy. The handle and hinge were both very loose. The screws were tight, but everything wobbled. It said that the pre heat would take 3 to 5 minutes. The ready light came on in about 30 seconds. It didn't cook the waffles. Over all it was a huge disappointment. I will never order another Oster product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it looks like used and repaired
customer_reviews.text: Folding handle is scratched, also it seems as broken because it has a BIG fissure, I thought I was buying a new product, it looks like used and repaired. El mango de la waflera está rayado, tiene una grieta gigante, se ve como si estuviera rota pero la hubieran intentado reparar, parece usada!!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the reviews about undercooked waffles. I love this thing. The key to crisp waffles is the recipe. You also need to let them cook a little longer. Don't pull them out as soon as the light turns green.
customer_reviews.author: James G

customer_reviews.title: It works just like the ones I use at the hotels
customer_reviews.text: It works just like the ones I use at the hotels. My kids love it since it easy to use and make great waffles would recommend to all my family and friends. Great product for the right price.
customer_reviews.author: F. Barrera

customer_reviews.title: This is a good little waffle iron
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little waffle iron. I like the ceramic plates -cooks evenly and non toxic! The handle is pretty weak though, so I feel like I have to baby it a little. All in all, for the price, I'm not complaining!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Baker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and cooks waffles like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and cooks waffles like a dream. The flip waffle maker was something we have used whilst on vacation and when I saw there is a teflon-free ceramic waffle maker that also flips... I couldn't resist! It cleans very easily with a damp paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for the $21 I paid. Makes delicious waffles if you cook for two minute longer after the green ready light goes off. Only complaint is it is somewhat difficult to clean but other than that it is a great waffle maker!
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have to get used to it (coming from an old regular one that doesn't flip)
customer_reviews.author: caprock

customer_reviews.title: Great for health nuts!
customer_reviews.text: I like to make "healthy" waffles that include very little fat. With my old waffle maker, I had to add a lot of oil or butter to guarantee that I would be able to get the waffle off the iron and on to my plate. That is not the case with this waffle iron! Incredibly non-stick and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: ARenee

customer_reviews.title: ... - one for each of my daughters - they love it! Easy clean up and perfect waffles every ...
customer_reviews.text: got two of these - one for each of my daughters - they love it! Easy clean up and perfect waffles every time!
customer_reviews.author: smurphy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: good value. I will agree with the other reviews that the stand is kind of flimsy and cheap but the iron itself is well made. I follow a paleo diet and use nut flours for the waffles. They come out fabulous !
customer_reviews.author: Jammy302

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: like it very much and it`s copper like other of my small appliances
customer_reviews.author: joly

customer_reviews.title: I already have one so I know she will love it. Easy to clean and makes perfect waffles
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. I already have one so I know she will love it. Easy to clean and makes perfect waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cook evenly after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: for some reason the grill doesn't cook evenly. waffles tend to have parts still white while others dark already.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the proce
customer_reviews.text: Works well, virtually no cleanup. Ceramic is the way to go
customer_reviews.author: Deedra Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Have used for a few weeks at this point. ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used for a few weeks at this point. Definitely follow the other reviews for advice on keeping the heat setting high and perhaps leaving to cook for a couple minutes after the ready light comes on. Following that advice, the waffles are crispy on the outside and golden-brown. I can't believe how well the ceramic non-stick coating works!
customer_reviews.author: L. Love

customer_reviews.title: Unstable, not level, wastes batter
customer_reviews.text: Love the ceramic. However, the platform is unstable...will not stay level, so we end up w/ the catch plate below being FULL of waffle batter. We are returning this product due to this defect.
customer_reviews.author: C Purvis

customer_reviews.title: would have liked if the waffles were made little more cripier
customer_reviews.text: would have liked if the waffles were made little more cripier ..more like Belgian waffles that you get served in restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3anddaughterofKing

customer_reviews.title: they don't make things like they used to this isn't a 1950s or 60s ...
customer_reviews.text: Sort of cheap, they don't make things like they used to this isn't a 1950s or 60s Oster 😞😟😟😟
customer_reviews.author: Franky Sprole

customer_reviews.title: had a piece broke off when I recieved it. ...
customer_reviews.text: had a piece broke off when I recieved it. It was packaged so very tight in the box. No cushioning around it at all! Reordered another brand
customer_reviews.author: Darlene C

customer_reviews.title: It works fine, however I wish it would get a tad ...
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, however I wish it would get a tad hotter. I want crispy waffles and I have not figured out how to do that with this appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Onetempi

customer_reviews.title: Not the one I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Ummm for some reason this looks nothing like the one I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Tendre

customer_reviews.title: Overall I really like this appliance
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this appliance. Have enjoyed making various flavored waffles. It is a little tedious to clean after making pecan or blueberry waffles. I recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job making waffles but hard to clean in all the external parts.
customer_reviews.author: Dondo123

customer_reviews.title: Great clean up!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, waffles are not as crispy as I would like for them to be, cleans up very very well
customer_reviews.author: Lenora

customer_reviews.title: No stick magic!
customer_reviews.text: No stick magic! Bought it for my dad to replace his old one... now he has even more fun being the grandpa morning chef when my kids stay over!

product_meta.title: Oster Titanium-Infused DuraCeramic Flip Waffle Maker, Black (CKSTWFBF10W-TECO)
product_meta.description: Style Name:CKSTWFBF10W-ECOMake Belgian-style waffles at home with the Oster Titanium-Infused DuraCeramic Flip Waffle Maker. This waffle iron allows you to quickly create waffles with an easy 'flip' operation. Simply grab the cool-touch handle and flip over the waffle maker to spread the batter evenly and create a perfectly shaped waffle. Featuring Titanium-Infused DuraCeramic nonstick coating, the waffle maker’s cooking surface is eight times more durable than ordinary nonstick surfaces and resists flaking and peeling. The PFOA- and PTFE- nonstick coating also cooks up to 30 percent faster than ordinary nonstick surfaces. Adjustable temperature control allows you to prepare waffles exactly to your preference. And thanks to a compact design that can be stored vertically, this waffle maker takes up minimal space in your kitchen.
feature_bullets: Waffle iron lets you quickly create delicious, fluffy waffles
Simple 'flip' operation helps ensure a perfectly shaped, evenly cooked waffle
Titanium-Infused DuraCeramic resists flaking and helps waffles release easily
PFOA- and PTFE-free coating lasts up to 8x longer and cooks up to 30% faster than other nonstick surfaces
Space-saving design can be stored vertically
